mapper.sql: set rcid=#{rcid}, rcname=#{rcname}, vtype=#{vtype}, tstart=#{tstart}, tend=#{tend}, active=#{active}, enroll=#{enroll}, city_id=#{cityId}, city_name=#{cityName}, common=#{common}, need_verify=#{needVerify}, reg_use=#{regUse}, auto=#{auto}, max_times=#{maxTimes}, indepent=#{indepent}, jpush=#{jpush}, ems=#{ems}, rejpush=#{rejpush}, reems=#{reems}, coupon_template=#{couponTemplate}, coupon_number=#{couponNumber}, agreement=#{agreement}, vstate=#{vstate}, reason=#{reason}, isdel=#{isdel}, cuid=#{cuid}, muid=#{muid}, ctime=#{ctime}, mtime=#{mtime}

set rcid=#{param1.rcid}, rcname=#{param1.rcname}, vtype=#{param1.vtype}, tstart=#{param1.tstart}, tend=#{param1.tend}, active=#{param1.active}, enroll=#{param1.enroll}, city_id=#{param1.cityId}, city_name=#{param1.cityName}, common=#{param1.common}, need_verify=#{param1.needVerify}, reg_use=#{param1.regUse}, auto=#{param1.auto}, max_times=#{param1.maxTimes}, indepent=#{param1.indepent}, jpush=#{param1.jpush}, ems=#{param1.ems}, rejpush=#{param1.rejpush}, reems=#{param1.reems}, coupon_template=#{param1.couponTemplate}, coupon_number=#{param1.couponNumber}, agreement=#{param1.agreement}, vstate=#{param1.vstate}, reason=#{param1.reason}, isdel=#{param1.isdel}, cuid=#{param1.cuid}, muid=#{param1.muid}, ctime=#{param1.ctime}, mtime=#{param1.mtime}

set rcid=#{param2.rcid}, rcname=#{param2.rcname}, vtype=#{param2.vtype}, tstart=#{param2.tstart}, tend=#{param2.tend}, active=#{param2.active}, enroll=#{param2.enroll}, city_id=#{param2.cityId}, city_name=#{param2.cityName}, common=#{param2.common}, need_verify=#{param2.needVerify}, reg_use=#{param2.regUse}, auto=#{param2.auto}, max_times=#{param2.maxTimes}, indepent=#{param2.indepent}, jpush=#{param2.jpush}, ems=#{param2.ems}, rejpush=#{param2.rejpush}, reems=#{param2.reems}, coupon_template=#{param2.couponTemplate}, coupon_number=#{param2.couponNumber}, agreement=#{param2.agreement}, vstate=#{param2.vstate}, reason=#{param2.reason}, isdel=#{param2.isdel}, cuid=#{param2.cuid}, muid=#{param2.muid}, ctime=#{param2.ctime}, mtime=#{param2.mtime}

rcid as rcid,rcname as rcname,vtype as vtype,tstart as tstart,tend as tend,active as active,enroll as enroll,city_id as cityId,city_name as cityName,common as common,need_verify as needVerify,reg_use as regUse,auto as auto,max_times as maxTimes,indepent as indepent,jpush as jpush,ems as ems,rejpush as rejpush,reems as reems,coupon_template as couponTemplate,coupon_number as couponNumber,agreement as agreement,vstate as vstate,reason as reason,isdel as isdel,isExit_rercid as isExitRercid ,rercid as rercid,reg_num as regNum,cuid as cuid,muid as muid,ctime as ctime,mtime as mtime
mapper.delete: delete from t_recharge_plan where rcid in #{item}
mapper.select: select rcid as rcid,rcname as rcname,vtype as vtype,tstart as tstart,tend as tend,active as active,enroll as enroll,city_id as cityId,city_name as cityName,common as common,need_verify as needVerify,reg_use as regUse,auto as auto,max_times as maxTimes,indepent as indepent,jpush as jpush,ems as ems,rejpush as rejpush,reems as reems,coupon_template as couponTemplate,coupon_number as couponNumber,agreement as agreement,vstate as vstate,reason as reason,isdel as isdel,isExit_rercid as isExitRercid ,rercid as rercid,reg_num as regNum,cuid as cuid,muid as muid,ctime as ctime,mtime as mtime from t_recharge_plan where rcid=#{param1} ${param2}
